text: @BuckSexton Well @NYGovCuomo did manage to murder 10,000 elderly citizens using #COVID19 to kick start his lockdown plans and trim his healthcare budget. I guess Dr. Fuaci recognizes a good @TheDemocrats Nazi when he sees one. There is NOTHING NY did right with this disease! @GOP
